before.text: Check back here or visit the APS CUWiP homepage to fill out your application at this time or sign up to be reminded when the application goes live. The application period will be open from September 1st until October 13th.

applyPeriod.text: Interested in attending CUWiP 2018? Begin your application today or visit our FAQ to learn if you are eligible to attend. The application period closes in at 11:59 PM EDT October 13th.

reviewPeriod.text: The application for CUWiP 2018 is now closed. To those who applied, thank you for your interest! We will review applications and inform you of your status on November 6th. If you missed out this time around, keep an eye out for CUWiP 2019!

registerPeriod.text: The application for CUWiP 2018 is now closed. To those who have been admitted, please be sure to confirm your attendance and fill out our site registration before <!--TODO-->insert date. If you missed out this time around, keep an eye out for CUWiP 2019!

after.text: The application and registration for CUWiP 2018 are now closed, but keep an eye out for information about CUWiP 2019 next fall! To this year's attendees, if you completed registration but did not yet receive a welcome email, please contact us immediately so that we can locate the error.

before.text: We hope you'll join us then! Look out for the application, coming September 1st!

applyPeriod.text: We hope you'll join us then! Don't forget to complete the application if you have not already done so!

reviewPeriod.text: We hope you'll join us then! Keep an eye out for information regarding your application status, which will be released around November 6th.

registerPeriod.text: We hope to see you there! If you plan on coming, don't forget to confirm your attendance and fill out your registration if you have not already done so!

after.text: We hope to see you there! Important updates regarding attendance will be sent directly to your email.
